pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
Right, I forgot to mention that I lowered the seat a bit. I've been able to reach the pedals with this setup. I'll work on making a video.

I'll confer with @nkoenig on integrating your meshes, as separate files, since he's been working on a solution for selecting specific nodes from a dae file.

Until we have any data on the polaris pedal parameters, I'm not planning to change them. Qualitatively, they seem to be working as prismatic joints.
content.html:
Right, I forgot to mention that I lowered the seat a bit. I've been able to reach the pedals with this setup. I'll work on making a video.

I'll confer with @nkoenig on integrating your meshes, as separate files, since he's been working on a solution for selecting specific nodes from a dae file.

Until we have any data on the polaris pedal parameters, I'm not planning to change them. Qualitatively, they seem to be working as prismatic joints.
